headline.main: VIERECK INDICTED AND SEIZED HERE AS GERMAN AGENT; Registered Foreign Publicist Accused of Not Reporting Propaganda Activities

lead_paragraph: George Sylvester Viereck, registered since October, 1939, as publicist for German interests, was arrested yesterday in his home at 305 Riverside Drive, on charges of withholding from the State Department material information concerning his propaganda activity.
abstract: Viereck arrested, N Y C; indicted; charged with aiding Make Eur Pay War Debts and Islands for war Debts Coms and with misuse of Cong franking privileges; data on income from German sources revealed; held in bail
